pages.text: Born from the very essence of light and radiance, the Aether Demigods are the children of the celestial realms. Their appearance is ethereal, with luminous skin and eyes that shine with the power of the stars. They are said to be blessed by the gods of light, chosen to bring hope and clarity to the world.

Their mere presence can lift the spirits of those around them, and their powers can purify the most corrupted of souls. Though their hearts are filled with light, they are burdened with the knowledge that their power is also a weapon, one that can bring both salvation and destruction. The Demigod Aether are natural practitioners of Luminus magic.

Their connection to the celestial bodies grants them the power to command light, heal the wounded, and banish darkness. They also have an affinity with Vocaris, using their powers to summon pure, radiant energies to protect the innocent and smite the wicked.
